r.s: This package generates php class files (objects) from Dreamweaver template files.
r.d: This package generates php class files (objects) from Dreamweaver template files.
r.n: Move code around. DWT.php is now in UNL/DWT.php instead of UNL/DWT/DWT.php = not compatible with old versions of UNL_Templates! * Switch to using static properties * Upgrade a lot of code to PHP 5 * Add phpdoc headers and coding standards fixes * Switch to BSD license.
